description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Zacks Micro Cap IndexTM.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of micro capitalization companies that comprise the underlying index. The underlying index was composed of 400 U.S. stocks that, strictly in accordance with its guidelines and mandated procedures, Zacks includes from a universe of 7,000 domestic companies.
